APIs.action: Lists all active alarms in the host
Give additional information about the alarm with the given uuid. This API will only be used if a UUID is informed by the user

Lists all host entities and information about each of them. Information such as persinality, IP, state and other information for each host. Unless the user query says it wants the host information, this API should not be used.
Lists all subclouds. This API will only be used in the central cloud
Summarizes alarms from all subclouds. This API will only be used in the central cloud

Shows attributes of the cloud system object, such as version, location, description, type, timezone and other information about the system. Preferbily this API should be used instead of ihosts, the exception is qhen the user specifies that it wants the information from a host.
Shows attributes of the DNS object
Shows attributes of the NTP object
List images in the local Docker registry
Lists all patches in the patching system
List pacthing information of all hosts
